messages.name: _com_wixpress_portfolio_projectitems_ProjectItemCreatedDomainEvent
messages.displayName: Project Item Created Domain Event Object

members.name: id
members.doc: Unique event ID.

members.name: entityFqdn
members.doc:
Expected `wix.portfolio.project_items.v1.project_item`.
Fully Qualified Domain Name.

members.name: slug
members.doc:
Expected `created`.
Event name.

members.name: createdEvent
members.doc: Event Info

members.name: entityId
members.doc: ProjectItem ID associated with this event.

members.name: eventTime
members.doc: Event timestamp.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether this event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application (e.g., GDPR).

members.name: originatedFrom
members.doc: If present, indicates the action that triggered the event.

members.name: external
members.doc: External link type

members.name: page
members.doc: Page link type

members.name: anchor
members.doc: Anchor link type

members.name: dynamicPage
members.doc: Dynamic page link type

members.name: document
members.doc: Document link type

members.name: email
members.doc: Email link type

members.name: phone
members.doc: Phone link type

members.name: address
members.doc: Address link type

members.name: whatsApp
members.doc: WhatsApp link type

members.name: url
members.doc: The url of the page

members.name: target
members.doc: Where this link should open, supports _self and _blank or any name the user chooses. _self means same page, _blank means new page.

members.name: pageId
members.doc: The page id we want from the site

members.name: target
members.doc: Where this link should open, supports _self and _blank or any name the user chooses. _self means same page, _blank means new page.

members.name: anchorName
members.doc: The name of the anchor

members.name: anchorDataId
members.doc: The data id (from the JSON page) of the anchor that should be used

members.name: pageId
members.doc: The page id we want from the site

members.name: routerId
members.doc: The router that handles this link

members.name: innerRoute
members.doc: The path data we'd like

members.name: anchorDataId
members.doc: The data id (from the JSON page) of the anchor that should be used

members.name: docId
members.doc: The id of the document

members.name: name
members.doc: The name of the document for download purposes

members.name: indexable
members.doc: If this document can be indexed by scrapers, default is false

members.name: recipient
members.doc: The email we will be sending a message to

members.name: subject
members.doc: The subject of the email

members.name: body
members.doc: The body of the email

members.name: phoneNumber
members.doc: The phone number we want to link to

members.name: address
members.doc: An address that we can link to

members.name: phoneNumber
members.doc: The whatsApp phone number we want to connect with

members.name: id
members.doc: WixMedia image ID. Required.

members.name: url
members.doc: Image URL.

members.name: height
members.doc: Original image height. Required.

members.name: width
members.doc: Original image width. Required.

members.name: altText
members.doc: Image alt text.

members.name: filename
members.doc: Image filename.

members.name: id
members.doc: WixMedia ID. Required when associating an existing Wix Media video.

members.name: url
members.doc: Video URL. Required when associating a video from an external source (YouTube/Vimeo).

members.name: resolutions
members.doc: Available resolutions for the video, starting with the optimal resolution.

members.name: filename
members.doc: Video filename.

members.name: posters
members.doc: Video posters.

members.name: url
members.doc: Video URL.  Required.

members.name: height
members.doc: Video height. Required.

members.name: width
members.doc: Video width.  Required.

members.name: format
members.doc: Video format for example, mp4, hls.  Required.

members.name: quality
members.doc: Video quality for example 480p, 720p.

members.name: filename
members.doc: Video filename.

members.name: id
members.doc: Item ID.

members.name: sortOrder
members.doc:
Item sort order.
Determines which position a media item is displayed in the gallery. 

Default: `[Epoch](https://www.epoch101.com/) timestamp in desc order` (end of the gallery items list)

members.name: title
members.doc: Item title.

members.name: description
members.doc: Item description.

members.name: link
members.doc: Link from the item. You can link to Wix sites or external URLs.

members.name: type
members.doc: Item data type.

members.name: createdDate
members.doc: Date and time the item was created.

members.name: updatedDate
members.doc: Date and time the item was last updated.

members.name: tags
members.doc: Item tags.

members.name: image
members.doc: Information about the image.

members.name: video
members.doc: Information about the video.

members.name: text
members.doc: Information about the text file.

members.name: values
members.doc: List of tags assigned to the media item.

members.name: imageInfo
members.doc: Image info - Wix Media Image. Required.

members.name: focalPoint
members.doc: Focal point of the image.

members.name: exif
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs describing the media in [Exchangeable Image File format](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Exif).

members.name: quality
members.doc:
Image compression level. 

Min: `30`
Max: `100`

members.name: unsharpMasking
members.doc: [Unsharp masking](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unsharp_masking) values of the image.

members.name: amount
members.doc:
Unsharp masking amount. Controls the sharpening strength.

Min: `0`
Max: `5`

members.name: radius
members.doc: Unsharp masking radius in pixels. Controls the sharpening width.

members.name: threshold
members.doc:
Unsharp masking threshold. Controls how different neighboring pixels must be for shapening to apply.

Min: `0`
Max: `1`

members.name: x
members.doc: X-coordinate of the focal point.

members.name: y
members.doc: Y-coordinate of the focal point.

members.name: image
members.doc: secondary media photo metadata (optional)

members.name: text
members.doc: secondary media text metadata (optional)

members.name: videoInfo
members.doc: Video info - can include Wix Media or an external link from YouTube or Vimeo. Required.

members.name: durationInMillis
members.doc: Video duration in milliseconds.

members.name: html
members.doc: Text in HTML format. Required.

members.name: css
members.doc:
Set of key-value pairs describing the [CSS style](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CSS) of the text.
__Note:__ The object structure is customizable. See the [List Gallery Items](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/site-content/pro-gallery/list-gallery-items) code example for supported values.

members.name: editorHtml
members.doc: Editor HTML of the text. **Note:** For internal use only.

members.name: editorFontId
members.doc: Editor font ID of the text. **Note:** For internal use only.

members.name: type
members.doc: Link type.

members.name: text
members.doc: Display text of the link.

members.name: url
members.doc: Target URL of the link.

members.name: target
members.doc:
Whether the link opens in a new tab or window. One of:
+ `"_blank"`: The link opens in a new tab or window.
+ `"_self"`: The link opens in the same tab or window.

docs.summary:
*
ProjectItem is the main entity of ProjectItemsService

members.name: projectId
members.doc:
Id of the Project the items are part of
Project must exist before adding items to it. project can be created/updated/deleted using this //TODO

members.name: item
members.doc: Item entity

members.name: totalSuccesses
members.doc: Number of items that were successfully processed.

members.name: totalFailures
members.doc: Number of items that couldn't be processed.

members.name: undetailedFailures
members.doc: Number of failures without details because detailed failure threshold was exceeded.

members.name: id
members.doc: Item ID. Should always be available, unless it's impossible (for example, when failing to create an item).

members.name: originalIndex
members.doc: Index of the item within the request array. Allows for correlation between request and response items.

members.name: success
members.doc: Whether the requested action was successful for this item. When `false`, the `error` field is populated.

members.name: error
members.doc: Details about the error in case of failure.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Number of items to load.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

members.name: count
members.doc: Number of items returned in the response.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Offset that was requested.

members.name: total
members.doc: Total number of items that match the query. Returned if offset paging is used and the `tooManyToCount` flag is not set.

members.name: tooManyToCount
members.doc: Flag that indicates the server failed to calculate the `total` field.

members.name: cursors
members.doc: Cursors to navigate through the result pages using `next` and `prev`. Returned if cursor paging is used.

members.name: next
members.doc: Cursor pointing to next page in the list of results.

members.name: prev
members.doc: Cursor pointing to previous page in the list of results.

members.name: currentEntityAsJson
members.doc:
Since platformized APIs only expose PATCH and not PUT we can't assume that the fields sent from the client are the actual diff.
 This means that to generate a list of changed fields (as opposed to sent fields) one needs to traverse both objects.
 We don't want to impose this on all developers and so we leave this traversal to the notification recipients which need it.

members.name: id
members.doc: random GUID so clients can tell if event was already handled

members.name: entityFqdn
members.doc:
Assumes actions are also always typed to an entity_type
 Example: wix.stores.catalog.product, wix.bookings.session, wix.payments.transaction

members.name: slug
members.doc:
This is top level to ease client code dipatching of messages (switch on entity_fqdn+slug)
 This is although the created/updated/deleted notion is duplication of the oneof types
 Example: created/updated/deleted/started/completed/email_opened

members.name: entityId
members.doc:
Assuming that all messages including Actions have id
 Example: The id of the specific order, the id of a specific campaign

members.name: eventTime
members.doc: The time of the event. Useful if there was a delay in dipatching

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc:
A field that should be set if this event was triggered by an anonymize request.
 For example you must set it to true when sending an event as a result of a GDPR right to be forgotten request.
 NOTE: This field is not relevant for `EntityCreatedEvent` but is located here for better ergonomics of consumers.

members.name: originatedFrom
members.doc: If present, indicates the action that triggered the event.

members.name: appDefId
members.doc: The AppDefId

members.name: instanceId
members.doc: The instance Id

members.name: reason
members.doc:
tell us why you're invalidating the cache. You don't need to add your app name
 The cache invalidation reason

members.name: localDc
members.doc: Is local DS

members.name: metaSiteId
members.doc: Invalidate by msId

members.name: app
members.doc: Invalidate by App

members.name: item
members.doc: Item to be created

members.name: item
members.doc: The created item

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • IMAGE
  • VIDEO
  • TEXT

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • WIX_MEDIA
  • EXTERNAL

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • WIX_MEDIA
  • YOUTUBE
  • VIMEO

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • EXTERNAL - external link
  • INTERNAL - link to wix pages
